thread.title: 7 Valentine's Day Cards for Kids to Make and Give
thread.title_full: 7 Valentine's Day Cards for Kids to Make and Give

title: 7 Valentine's Day Cards for Kids to Make and Give
text:
Free Coloring Pages and Printable Projects 
Go homemade this Valentine’s Day and make your own DIY Valentine’s cards for your kids! These 7 Valentine’s Day cards for kids to make and give are perfect for handing out to students at their school or gifting to friends and family. All of these ideas are cute, easy, and perfect for little hands to craft! 
Here are 7 ideas for a Valentine's classroom party cards: Dandee 1. Magnifying Glass Valentines 
1. Magnifying Glass Valentines : Help your kiddos make these adorable magnifying glass Valentines! These don’t take long to craft which means you can make a lot of them for a school class! Get the instructions for these cuties at Dandee ! More » 
continue reading below our video 5 Home Accents & Accessories You Can DIY Alpha Mom 
2. Lunchbox Valentines : Go candy-less this year and make these fun fruit Valentines! Have your kids attach the note to a piece of yummy fruit with a rubber band! Get the free printable from Alpha Mom ! More » MollyMooCrafts 3. Melted Crayon Valentine 
3. Melted Crayon Valentine : Use old crayons to make a melted crayon heart to go along with a Valentine Card! Your little ones can write their own heartfelt message on the cards for their friends at school. MollyMooCrafts has the details and instructions! More » No Biggie 
4. Paper Airplane Valentine : Kids can have a blast making a ton of paper airplanes that double as Valentines for their class! These are fun, easy, and inexpensive! Get the tutorial from No Biggie ! More » Make and Takes 
5. Pop Up Cards : Open the card to see the pop up surprise! This card is different, festive, and everyone will love it! Make and Takes has the instructions! More » It’s Always Autumn 6. You’re a Star Valentine 
6. You’re a Star Valentine : Attach little Starburst candies to these printable cards to make “You’re a Star!” Valentines! Make your own potato stamp to help create this card. Visit It’s Always Autumn for the full tutorial! More » Make and Takes 
7. Monster Valentine Cards : Aren’t these homemade Valentines monster-ific? These are sure to be eye-popping fun for any boy or girl to receive! Head over to Make and Takes for the how-to! More » Related Articles
